rooms.name: Open Plan Living and Kitchen
rooms.description: A spacious Scandinavian design living area with integrated kitchen, large windows for ample natural light, wooden floors, and minimalistic decor. Vastu guidelines are followed with east facing entrance for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space adjacent to the living area for joint family gatherings. Designed in a Scandinavian minimalist style with functional layout and ample seating.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and large windows oriented towards the south to maximize sunlight. Vastu alignment encourages a peaceful sleeping environment.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact guest bedroom for family visitors with essential storage and decor elements that adhere to Scandinavian simplicity.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office area designed for productive work environments. Features include soundproofing, ergonomic desk setup, and natural lighting from the west window.

rooms.name: Study Area
rooms.description: A small study space integrated with storage solutions, positioned for privacy while following Scandinavian minimalism.
